description.value:
Fire

Aura 5

Each creature that starts its turn within the aura takes 15 fire damage. See also shield of fire.

Basic Attack

At-Will

Standard, At-Will

Reach 3

+37 vs AC; 4d8+10 damage.

At-Will

Standard, At-Will

The retriever holocaust makes four claw attacks, less one claw for each creature it has grabbed

At-Will

Standard, At-Will

Reach 3

Targets up to four creatures, less one for each creature the retriever already has grabbed; +35 vs Fortitude; 3d8+10 damage, and the target is grabbed. The retriever can move a creature it has grabbed without making a Strength attack.

Basic Attack

At-Will ✦ Fire, Necrotic

Immediate Interrupt

Trigger: When a creature within the retriever's holocaust aura makes an attack roll, at-will

+35 vs Fortitude; 4d10+9 fire and necrotic damage, and the triggering attack takes a -2 penalty to the attack roll.

Recharge 5-6 ✦ Fire, Necrotic

Standard, Recharge

Ranged 10

Three attacks at three different targets; +35 vs Fortitude or Fortitude (whichever is lower); 3d10+9 fire and necrotic damage, and the target takes ongoing 5 fire and necrotic damage and is dazed (save ends both). A creature already dazed is stunned (save ends).
Each time the retriever holocaust teleports, it unleashes a storm of fire at its destination in a close burst 3: +35 vs. Reflex; 2d10 + 9 fire damage, and the target is blinded (save ends).

Healing

Standard

Trigger: When first bloodied

The retriever regains 100 hit points and gains a +4 bonus to AC until the start of its next turn.

Daily ✦ Teleportation

Standard

The retriever senses the general location of the target or nearest creature of the type it was commanded to locate. The retriever teleports to within 10 squares of the target. The target need not be on the same plane as the retriever.

Passive Perception 34 | Insight 34
